thread.title: BRIEF-Analogic To Be Acquired By Affiliate Of Altaris Capital Partners For $1.1 Bln In Cash

title: BRIEF-Analogic To Be Acquired By Affiliate Of Altaris Capital Partners For $1.1 Bln In Cash
text:
April 10, 2018 / 8:14 PM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-Analogic To Be Acquired By Affiliate Of Altaris Capital Partners For $1.1 Bln In Cash Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 10 (Reuters) - Analogic Corp: 
* ANALOGIC TO BE ACQUIRED BY AN AFFILIATE OF ALTARIS CAPITAL PARTNERS FOR $84.00 PER SHARE OR $1.1 BILLION IN CASH * ANALOGIC BOARD UNANIMOUSLY RECOMMENDS TRANSACTION 
* TRANSACTION AND MERGER AGREEMENT WERE UNANIMOUSLY APPROVED BY ANALOGICâ€™S BOARD OF DIRECTORS 
* UPON COMPLETION OF TRANSACTION, ANALOGIC WILL BECOME A PRIVATELY HELD COMPANY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
